remarks.para: May be inoperative provided speedbrake lever is not positioned beyond ARMED position inflight below 800 feet radio altitude or when landing flaps are extended.

numlitem.para: Do not position the speedbrake lever beyond the ARM detent inflight below 800 feet radio altitude or when landing flaps are extended.

placard.para: Placard SPEED BRAKE Light “INOP” and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
